name: i2022
description:
HOW TO PLAY
*Tap the tiles to get the number plus one.
*Combine for new number when three or more tiles with the same number.
*Try to get the much more higher number and higher score.
*Endless mode, Don't worry! no time limits!

FEATURES
*No AD!
*Play easily and quickly.
*Free and filled with adventure!
*Game is automatically saved.
*Sensitivity configuration.
*Native iOS app with super performance and smooth animation.
*share score with friends by screen shot, no social app limit.

Install and check out right now!
Enjoy game for any time, anywhere and a short time.
